content: उत्तेजनं, --ना {@--1@} Excitement, instigation, animating, stirring up; °समथः श्लोकैः <ls>Mu. 4</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Urging on, driving. {@--3@} Sending, despatching. {@--4@} Whetting, sharpening, furbishing, polishing (weapons &c.); <ls>Śi. 3. 6.</ls> {@--5@} An exciting speech. {@--6@} An inducement, incentive, stimulant.
